# actualTrackingAdjustment

**Instance Property**

The actual tracking value that the system applied during drawing.

## Declaration

```swift
var actualTrackingAdjustment: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

If you specified a custom value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSStringDrawingContext/minimumTrackingAdjustment] property, when drawing is complete, this property contains the actual tracking value that was used.

## Deprecated

- **minimumTrackingAdjustment**: The smallest amount of space, in points, to maintain between characters.
